1: dang rgyas pa <mistake>dang//yig</mistake> <mistake>chan</mistake> yang ni rtag par bdag gis 'grub par byed//de nas mchog skyes rgyal ba thams cad dga' nas <mistake>su //'dzum</mistake> pa chen po thams cad khyab par rnam par 'byed//
2: kun bdag dbyings kyi rdul phran mchog <mistake>than</mistake> gzugs dag gis//kun nas de la legs pa'i <mistake>sku</mistake> ni dbul bar byed//bdag gis dbyings kun rjes su che mchog gzugs kyis <mistake>su//pa</mistake>
3: mchog gyur pa sangs rgyas <mistake>kan</mistake> gyis legs so legs//mchog gi rdo rje las byung khyod ni legs so <mistake>lags//dam</mistake> pa'i chos nyid chos kyi bdag nyid legs so <mistake>legs // dam</mistake> pa'i las can
4: mchod pa'i bdag nyid legs so <mistake>lags//rtog</mistake> pa'i <mistake>dbyin</mistake> <mistake>brlabs</mistake> mdzod cig mnyam par byin brlabs kyis//don yod dngos grub rtag tu yig <mistake>'bu</mistake> <mistake>tshen</mistake> po <mistake>yi //grub</mistake> pas phyi na mi <mistake>dul</mistake>
5: <mistake>pa</mistake> yi dus su ni//de dag gi yang ji ltar dam pa'i <mistake>pa der</mistake> 'gyur phyir//de ltar <mistake>nag</mistake> chen zhus nas su//sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//rdo rje sems <mistake>dba'</mistake> chen po <mistake>yis// gsungs</mistake> pa
6: la ni mngon par bstod//sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam <mistake>por</mistake> sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i <mistake>mchogces</mistake> bya ba khri brgyad stong pa las <mistake>rtogs</mistake> pa thams cad kyi <mistake>gyal</mistake> po brgya bcu bdun
7: pa rdzogs <mistake>sho///rgya</mistake> gar gyi mkhan po <mistake>sma tri</mistake> <mistake>dzan</mistake> <mistake>kAr</mistake> <mistake>ri nyid</mistake> kyis <mistake>bsgyur///yon</mistake> bdag <mistake>pod</mistake> kyi mkhan po gzhon nu grags pas zhus te bshad nas <mistake>gta'</mistake> la <mistake>phabcing</mistake> zhus////
8: @@//rgya gar skad <mistake>du/ te</mistake> <mistake>bdza</mistake> tan <mistake>ta</mistake> <mistake>r' dA</mistake> <mistake>n'am/pod</mistake> <mistake>skaddu/kya'i</mistake> <mistake>rdo</mistake> <mistake>rje</mistake> <mistake>zhes</mistake> <mistake>bya</mistake> ba rgyud kyi rgyal <mistake>po//k'i</mistake> rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig <mistake>na/bcom</mistake>
